#summary How to install and run SubDownloader on GNU/Linux

=Subdownloader 2.0 beta for GNU/Linux=
==From Packages==
||Debian/Ubuntu || .deb packages [https://launchpad.net/subdownloader/trunk/2.0 here] ||
|| ArchLinux || Package [http://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=18316 here] ||

==Run from sources ==
  * Download and install:
    * python2.5
    * python-qt4
    * python-mmpython (only needed for Uploading)
  * Download and uncompress the latest [https://launchpad.net/subdownloader/trunk/2.0.3 sources]
  * *Graphical Interface:* Execute "python _run.py_"
  * *Command line version:* Execute "python _run.py --help_" to see all the options available

*Note:* It's a beta version. Please give us your [http://code.google.com/p/subdownloader/issues/list feedback]. Thanks.
